subject: Football
Traffic Accidents and Safety
Drunken and Reckless Driving
lead_paragraph: David Diehl, a longtime offensive lineman for the Giants, was arrested and charged with drunken driving after crashing his BMW into a row of parked cars in Astoria, Queens, on Sunday night.
snippet: David Diehl, a longtime offensive lineman for the Giants, was arrested and charged with drunken driving after crashing his BMW into a row of parked cars in Astoria, Queens, on Sunday night.
